definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Ternary tungsten-tellurite glass system was researched in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 研究了掺铒钨碲酸盐玻璃的吸收光谱和荧光光谱。

sentences.english: The method has been applied to the determination of Se and Te in high purity silver with satisfactory results.
sentences.chinese: 该方法用于高纯银中微量硒碲的测定，结果满意。

sentences.english: Erbium ion-doped tungstentellurite glass was fabricated and characterized by absorption spectrum and fluorescence spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 研究了掺铒钨碲酸盐玻璃的吸收光谱和荧光光谱。

sentences.english: The cast-penetration process with a tellurium coating is a useful special casting process.
sentences.chinese: 碲涂料铸渗工艺是一项经济实用的特种铸造工艺。

sentences.english: The formation of gold telluride deposits is closely related to pyritization-sericitization-silification.
sentences.chinese: 碲金矿的形成与黄铁绢英岩化密切相关。

sentences.english: The processing method for bismuth-tellurium concentrate was pyrometallurgy traditionally.
sentences.chinese: 对铋碲精矿的处理，传统的方法是火法冶炼。

sentences.english: Study on spectroscopic properties and thermal stability of novel erbium-doped tellurite glasses;
sentences.chinese: 研究了掺铒钨碲酸盐玻璃的吸收光谱和荧光光谱。

sentences.english: The Te-O thin film as a reversible optical recording medium is a very promising material.
sentences.chinese: 碲氧薄膜是很有希望的可擦写光盘介质材料。

sentences.english: In this paper, the preparation of tribasic lead sulfate from lead slag formed during tellurium extraction was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了以脱碲铅渣为原料制备三盐基硫酸铅的工艺。

sentences.english: The measurement results for Hg Cd Te photodiodes are presented.
sentences.chinese: 文中列出了碲镉汞光电二极管结电容的测量结果。

definition: see 釕銱兒|钌铞儿[liao4 diao4 r5]/Taiwan pr. [liao3]
